title: Why isn't this game good.
body: This game isn't good. You can't even quickscope. It is bads. UI wish callz of doty eas oplayable here so i can be great.

replies.body: Pick thresh, spin around once on the spot and then close ur eyes and pull. thats how you 360 noscope on thresh
Nah you can 360 quickscope with Caitlyn. I do it every game and get 20 hexakills every game
